name: DefaultMapEntryTest
description: Tests for the DefaultMapEntry class, focusing on constructors and self-reference handling.

methods.name: makeMapEntry
methods.signature: Map.Entry<K, V> makeMapEntry(K key, V value)

test_cases.name: testConstructors
test_cases.description: Tests the constructors of DefaultMapEntry and DefaultKeyValue, ensuring correct key and value assignment and independence of objects.

test_cases.name: testSelfReferenceHandling
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of self-references in DefaultMapEntry, ensuring that setting the value to the entry itself works correctly.
